title: Hour 3 - Donnie Wahlberg (04-02-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Donnie Wahlberg (04-02-20)
description:
'The Odd Couple' Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Dannettes, and the guys debate whether or not the timing of LeBron's plan to do a video breakdown of his best games is his way of trying to one-up Michael Jordan, and discuss if the NBA moving the official start date to the regular season to Christmas Day is a good idea. Plus, 6x Pro Bowler Donovan McNabb explains why there's a racial component to why Cam Newton can't get a job in the NFL right now, and actor Donnie Wahlberg discusses what he's expecting from his beloved New England Patriots moving forward now that Tom Brady has moved on to Tampa Bay.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
